name: Mr Sneezy
description:
Play as Mr Sneezy, Sneeze on the eyeball things on springs and the people eating pink goop. Idk im out of ideas. But you have Covid and are trying to get enough medicine to cure it. But the bad guys are trying to kill you for some reason. Survive for 100 seconds to win. This game fits the theme 'Under The Weather' because you are sick and sneezing. Yeah...

Also have to include this for legal reasons...

"Hard Boiled" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
